entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain early in the morning. Rain showers beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 8 with temperature rising to 13 by morning.
